purpose: Facilitates the rapid development and coordination of chatbots and multi-agent applications through a low-code workflow-based platform.
principle: Built on LangGraph and Langchain for agent management, utilizing FastAPI for backend services and NextJS for frontend interfaces.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with APIs for integrating custom agents and workflows, allowing for extensibility and reuse across different applications.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential bugs; primarily designed for developers familiar with the tech stack.
name: flock
description: Flock is a workflow-based low-code platform for rapidly building chatbots, RAG, and coordinating multi-agent teams, powered by LangGraph, Langchain, FastAPI, and NextJS.（Flock 是一个基于workflow工作流的低代码平台，用于快速构建聊天机器人、RAG、Agent和Muti-Agent应用，采用 LangGraph、Langchain、FastAPI 和 NextJS 构建。）
highlight: A low-code platform for building and orchestrating chatbots and multi-agent systems using workflows.
